item.title: By: Teresa
item.dc:creator: Teresa
item.description:
We used BlueRoof to find our home and we have been so impressed with them. We would recommend them to anyone. We didn't work with Greg directly but he was really helpful and answered our calls late on a Sunday night (when we planned on leaving a message) and spent a good ten minutes just explaining some things for us.
We really liked the other people we worked with that they referred us to also. I just want to share our experience.
item.content:encoded:
We used BlueRoof to find our home and we have been so impressed with them. We would recommend them to anyone. We didn’t work with Greg directly but he was really helpful and answered our calls late on a Sunday night (when we planned on leaving a message) and spent a good ten minutes just explaining some things for us.

We really liked the other people we worked with that they referred us to also. I just want to share our experience.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Econ -
I don't know anything about the folks behind the blueroof.com site. I do like the interface though for searching for homes.
item.content:encoded:
@Econ –

I don’t know anything about the folks behind the blueroof.com site. I do like the interface though for searching for homes.

item.title: By: Econ
item.dc:creator: Econ
item.description: Blue Roof is not a trustworthy website. It is full of misinformation and does not give a clear picture of what is truly going on. Greg, the administrator/owner, is a dishonest person and should no be trusted
item.content:encoded: Blue Roof is not a trustworthy website. It is full of misinformation and does not give a clear picture of what is truly going on. Greg, the administrator/owner, is a dishonest person and should no be trusted

item.title: By: Utah Facebook Developers Garage August Meeting | Joseph Scott's Blog
item.dc:creator: Utah Facebook Developers Garage August Meeting | Joseph Scott's Blog
item.description: [...] was fun, it was my first tech outing since moving to Utah. It’s good to get out from coding in the home office for some face to face interaction. [...]

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Dude, leaving the job wasn't enough, eh? You had to go and leave the whole freakin' STATE?!? Well, good luck to you and yours. Hopefully we'll get our <a href="http://sonicchicken.net/remodel" rel="nofollow">remodel</a> done (and throw a party!) before you leave.
item.content:encoded: Dude, leaving the job wasn’t enough, eh? You had to go and leave the whole freakin’ STATE?!? Well, good luck to you and yours. Hopefully we’ll get our remodel done (and throw a party!) before you leave.

item.title: By: joseph
item.dc:creator: joseph
item.description: My Realtor is also my Mother-in-Law, so no, I did not meet her from either of the two sites I mentioned :-)

item.title: By: Greg Staker
item.dc:creator: Greg Staker
item.description: I found your blog in my search for online marketing tips for real estate. Thanks for giving a review of those 2 sites and what you found helpful. My question is, did you use a Realtor you met from either of those 2 sites?
item.content:encoded: I found your blog in my search for online marketing tips for real estate. Thanks for giving a review of those 2 sites and what you found helpful. My question is, did you use a Realtor you met from either of those 2 sites?
